```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
fungus <- read.csv(here("data", "raw_data", "Rhus Ovata Mycorrhizae Data - raw data.csv")) %>% 
  select(plot, id, Site.., X..of.Vesicles, X..of.Arbuscules, X..of.Hyphae) %>%
  mutate(X..of.Vesicles = case_when(X..of.Vesicles == 2 ~ 1,
                                    TRUE ~ X..of.Vesicles)) %>% 
  group_by(plot, id) %>% 
  reframe(vesicle_colonization = sum(X..of.Vesicles)/15,
          arbuscule_colonization = sum(X..of.Arbuscules)/15,
          hyphae_colonization = sum(X..of.Hyphae)/15) %>% 
  filter(plot != "") %>% 
  mutate(date = mdy("4-12/-2023"))

write.csv(fungus, here("data", "clean_data", "fungus_clean.csv"))
```
